answers.answer: diabetes causes vasoconstriction and also blood in diabetes is thick so there wil be limited oxygen supplied to the limbs which will lead to that pain. but you may visit other healthworkers and seek for advise

question: I am a diabetic, of late having mild continuous pain at upper left arm. I don't have any injuries and am 51 years old.What causes the pain ??
title: Pain - upper left arm
